derivation: from a compound of G2095 (εὐτραπελία) and a derivative of the base of G5157 (εὐτραπελία) (meaning well-turned, i.e. ready at repartee, jocose);
strongs_def: witticism, i.e. (in a vulgar sense) ribaldry
outline:
1. pleasantry, humour, facetiousness
  2. in a bad sense
    1. scurrility, ribaldry, low jesting
